column2: Paralyzed rear legs, no apparent tumor present. Back of skull bulging upwards.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen
Back of skull was rubbery and not intact. Distinction between brain, skull and connective tissue was unclear. May have been a tumor there, and if there was it clearly invaded the skull.
No cell lines or chunks frozen.
